mapper.select: SELECT cc.CAT_NAME as catName, sc.SUB_TITLE as subTitle, ii.NAME, ss.SUB_CODE as subCode, (COUNT(CASE WHEN ls.STATUS = 'C' THEN 1 END) / NULLIF(s.TOTAL_NO, 0)) * 100 AS percent, CASE WHEN COALESCE(se.try_count, 0) != 3 AND s.TOTAL_NO = COUNT(CASE WHEN ls.STATUS = 'C' THEN 1 END) THEN '응시' ELSE '미응시' END AS examStatus FROM CAT_CODE cc JOIN SUBJECT_CODE sc ON cc.CAT_CODE = sc.CAT_CODE JOIN STD_SUBJECT ss ON ss.SUB_CODE = sc.SUB_CODE JOIN SUB_INSTRUCTOR si ON si.SUB_CODE = sc.SUB_CODE JOIN INST_INFO ii ON ii.INST_ID = si.INST_ID JOIN LEC_STATUS ls ON ls.SUB_CODE = sc.SUB_CODE JOIN SUBJECT s ON s.SUB_CODE = sc.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN STD_EXAM se ON se.SUB_CODE = sc.SUB_CODE AND se.STD_ID = ss.STD_ID WHERE ss.STD_ID = #{subCode} GROUP BY cc.CAT_NAME, sc.SUB_TITLE, ii.NAME, s.TOTAL_NO, se.try_count, ss.SUB_CODE
